category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_pv_create_dataset_for_active_shapes
preference.preference_description: Change JT dataset created during the Save process in Teamcenter Integration for CATIA, by setting the following variable within Teamcenter Preferences. The default value is true. This preference is ignored when the Save Active Shapes button is toggled off or the Create JT button is toggled on in Save Manager toolbar. When the Save Active Shapes button is toggled on and the Create JT button is toggled off in the Save Manager toolbar, and theCATIA_pv_create_dataset_for_active_shapes preference is set to true, JT datasets are created for active CATParts and default shapes whose type is defined in COMMONcatiatojt_ets_ds_types.
